name: Bees Against The World
description:
Summary

The world is a dangerous place for a bee hive. There are many things that can harm a hive and it's growth. That's why it is up to you, the Special Bee, a bee that can be resurrected and can grow stronger, to venture out and protect the hive.

Gather nectar, strengthen your hive and protect your Queen Bee and protect yourself from the many enemies that seek to destroy your hive in this Top Down Action RPG.

Controls

WASD - Player Movement

Spacebar - Attack
